Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of Sš n pr-ʿ3 ḫḫ with black painted detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced eyes and parallel hands in relief with bracelets holding two hoes and the string of the seed-basket that hangs over the shoulder; the front of the leg section is inscribed with black painted Hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
